website_summaries.verdict: This is a 65% bio-based detergent that’s free of dyes, brighteners, phosphates and chlorine, with plant-based surfactants and a coconut-derived cleaning agent.
pros: Produced 100% with wind power at a zero manufacturing waste facility
Concentrated formula, so the large container will last for many loads
cons: Some users report this product overly produces soap bubbles – be sure to follow measurement instructions for your washer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I can’t use most of the major brand detergents because it irritates my skin, however tide has always been the go brand. So when I came across purclean I had to have it. It smells amazing. I don’t have to use fabric softener or when I forget, the scent lasts through drying and days after. I love it. From the packaging to the formula itself. Just amazing
customer_reviews.author: suttonkae

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money and great scent. Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for my now toddler since he was 6 months old with no skin irritation at all, my husband also has sensitive skin and has had no reaction either. I love the lavender scent and value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Good detergent that works but not very many loads per bottle
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. I work out daily and this gets my workout gear nice and clean and smelling fresh. Only downsize is it doesn’t go very far. They measured how many loads are per bottle by the first line in the cup and that is not enough for a regular load. This bottle did not last me even a month
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Houk

customer_reviews.title: and I'm happy to report it's not an overwhelming scent in this ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize this was lavender/honey scented until several washes in. Thank goodness! I'm not a fan of lavender, and I'm happy to report it's not an overwhelming scent in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jill K

customer_reviews.title: I have bought this a few times already.
customer_reviews.text: I love the very light scent. This detergent definitely get the job done as for cleaning fabrics, clothing, etc. I have notice that I drain the bottle a bit quicker than my usual choice of laundry pods. That explains the 4 stars. Other than that this is preferred for my clothing and baby.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Lena

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Each time I use this, there are bubbles left in the washer at the end of the cycle. This is the only detergent it happens with, so I know it’s not my machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very strong scent but good
customer_reviews.text: I chose to deviate from the original Tide Detergent and this one was ok. I found that the solution is very concentrated as well so beware to not damage certain clothes. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Luz Cintron

customer_reviews.title: Tide is my way to go
customer_reviews.text: Tide is my go to detergent. Especially since there are so many types. I love the Febreeze with lavender for towels and sheets. Love w/bleach for my whites and of course the "sport" for washing 16 yr olds gym clothes.
customer_reviews.author: keizer coho

customer_reviews.title: Tide must be cleaning up with this product!
customer_reviews.text: It'd get five stars but I happen to like some scent in my laundry. This product works well, but I'm buying regular Tide HD next time.
customer_reviews.author: Cobbler

customer_reviews.title: Nice light lavender scent
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, the scent is just light enough and not over powering and it is not hard on clothes.
customer_reviews.author: wiggy

customer_reviews.title: Hives
customer_reviews.text: This may work for some and although I love the smell it broke my baby out in hives.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Top Value for the Cost
customer_reviews.text: STOP Everything and BUY TIDE PurClean Liquid Laundry... Where has this been my whole life?! 1/4 cup and this stuff had giant bundles of our grittiest family & pet laundry filled with bubbles! Everything actually came out CLEAN! It’s a miracle. It smells great (not overpowering) and just WoW! I’ve found my happy space with laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Jane R.

customer_reviews.title: excellent will buy again
customer_reviews.text: One of my most favorite. Since I had chemo I developed a sensibility to laundry detergent. This and Tide white are the only ones that don't make my skin itch.
customer_reviews.author: Doina "Day" Berndt dba Kalyana Design

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this cleans and the fragrance isn’t overwhelming. Nice. I’ve used this the last 3 rounds of detergent.
customer_reviews.author: RoadSinger

customer_reviews.title: Product works well
customer_reviews.text: I really like the detergent. The only problem was the packing. When it arrived there was some spillage and the package and detergent were all slippery from the leakage.
customer_reviews.author: pahlstrom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is some realy good detergent and wow!!! This stuff smealls good.
customer_reviews.author: DAMON PARNELL

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered spilled all over the box it was delivered in. It was extremely messyy.
customer_reviews.author: Shaneese London

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a foul scent
customer_reviews.text: This Tide honey lavender scent left all my clothes smelling funky with a moldy like smell. Had to rewash items with my trusted Seventh Generation detergent instead and my clothes were back to normal. I won't be repurchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie

customer_reviews.title: Not good for gym clothes
customer_reviews.text: This DOES NOT get the deodorant out my work out clothes. Gym clothes need more natural ingredients with no scent and I thought my beloved Tide had given me something great. Nope! Every item still smells like my NATURAL deodorant. I was really hoping to find something cheaper than Defunkify for my running gear but this was a total zero. I am so disappointed. I won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Gosse

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Cleans just like the original
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Cleans just like the original. It did kind of worry for a bit there when I only had 5 minutes left in the wash cycle, but there's was still suds everywhere!! Thankfully they all dissolved and our laundry smells great! Not too over powering either .
customer_reviews.author: Julie A.

customer_reviews.title: I love the scent
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent, it cleans our clothes and I feel good about using a product that isn’t harming the environment.
customer_reviews.author: L. English

customer_reviews.title: Tide purclean
customer_reviews.text: I love this tide purclean, this formula is made with 100% renewable electricity and 0% dyes. If you are looking for a detergent that will remove stains and works great this is the one ! I love it so much
customer_reviews.author: Sasharose

customer_reviews.title: Lovely smell
customer_reviews.text: I received tide pure clean as a sample, and I love it. Has a soft clean, lavender smell. I also love the fact that it is dye free and good for the environment. I will definitely keep using this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: I love how eco friendly it is
customer_reviews.text: I received free samples of this from Tide on Crowdtap. I love how eco friendly it is. It did a great job cleaning baseball uniforms!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Scent free please
customer_reviews.text: I received samples on Crowdtap and I was impressed by the product overall, but the scent left me wanting something different...maybe they should come up with a scent free version?
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Tide purcleanTM detergent is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Tide purcleanTM detergent is great , it cleans your clothes great and it takes out stains out of your clothes , Tide purcleanTM detergent smells great too.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Sahouri

product_meta.title: Tide Purclean Plant-based Laundry Detergent, Honey Lavender Scent, 50 Fl Oz
product_meta.description: Tide plus Febrile sport active liquid fresh scent liquid laundry detergent provides a deep down clean that fights and eliminates harsh sports odors including sweat. Specially formulated to deliver a brilliant clean and tough odor removal while leaving behind the fresh scent of Febrile. Product is available in a 46oz size for approximately 24 loads.
feature_bullets: 1st bio-based detergent with the cleaning power of Tide (65% bio-based)
USDA Certified Tide liquid laundry detergent
Formula made with 100% renewable wind power electricity
This product is made at a zero manufacturing waste to landfill site
It is designed free of dyes, chlorine, phosphates or optical brighteners

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
